attributes.action: urge all political party leaders (himself, David Cameron, Nick Clegg plus The Speaker of the House of Commons) to resign - as this is the only way to create a fresh start following the recent cross-party expenses scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of scoring cheap political points off eachother - the whole lot need to resign - and we need a fresh start.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
